DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate relationship basmisanil plasma concentration occupancy Gamma-Amino Butyric Acid A ( GABAA ) receptor subtypes contain alpha5 ( Î±5 ) subunit healthy Japanese volunteer . Each participant two post-screening imaging session . In first imaging session , participant baseline Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) scan . In second imaging session , participant receive single oral dose basmisanil , follow two on-treatment PET scan 4 10 hour post-dose .
DOC.brief_title: Basmisanil Positron Emission Tomography Study Japanese Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male female Japanese healthy volunteer , born Japan , 4 ethnically Japanese grandparent live outside Japan longer 5 year A body mass index ( BMI , Quetelet index ) range 18.0 32.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) Willingness ability comply study restriction A history epilepsy , convulsion significant head injury , structural brain abnormality Pregnant lactate use acceptable contraception Presence history severe adverse reaction drug history sensitivity basmisanil PET radioligand ( RO154513 ) Significant exposure radiation within previous 12 month Any clinically relevant abnormality , concomitant disease ongoing medical condition
